intro.description:
The next steps show you how to configure your AUT.
It is assumed that you are working locally on your machine. If not, change the AUT Agent details accordingly.

item.title: Configuring the AUT
item.description:
Select:
Test > Properties
Select AUT's from the list on the left, select the Adder AUT and click Edit.
Click Add to add a configuration.
Enter SimpleAdder_1 as the AUT ID.
Enter or browse to the executable file:
InstallationDirectory\examples\AUTs\SimpleAdder\swing\SimpleAdder.cmd
Unix users select SimpleAdder.sh.
Click OK, then OK in the other dialogs.
